Description.name: Description0
Description.content: The default option. The setting is only shown when the formatted element is dropped directly at the page.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: The setting is shown if the formatted element is directly dropped to the page and with the element settings of the list like a native setting of the list.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: The setting is shown if the formatted element is directly dropped to the page and with the element settings of the list, but in an extra section in the settings dialog.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: The setting is not shown if the formatted element is directly dropped to the page, but with the element settings of lists like a native list setting.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: The setting is only shown with the list's settings, but in an extra section in the settings dialog.
